/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. Buildings of various sizes and designs can be seen in the distance, interspersed with power lines that crisscross above the road. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
